text: avarkal salihaiyum avarutaiya kutumpattaiyum iravotu iravaka nam alittu vituvom. (Itai oruvaritamum kuruvatillai enru) nam namakkullaka allah mitu cattiyam ceytukontu avarutaiya contakkararkalitam, ‘‘avar vettuppatta itattirku nankal varaveyillai. Niccayamaka nankal unmaiye collukirom'' enru nam kurivitalam enru kurik kontarkal
